/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the buildings that line the street. These buildings, constructed of brick, rise high into the clear blue sky, their red roofs adding a splash of color to the urban landscape. Power lines crisscross above, connecting the buildings and adding a touch of modernity to the scene. The street itself is lined with trees, their green leaves contrasting with the brick and concrete structures. In the distance, construction cranes can be seen, hinting at the ongoing development and growth of the city. The image is a snapshot of urban life in Beijing, capturing the blend of history and modernity that characterizes the city.
